transcript:
[Ringing]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello ji kya meri baat Upendra ji se ho rahi hai?
Customer: Han ji.
Executive: Ji sir main chitti baat kar rahi hu India Mart se.
Customer: Han ji madam.
Executive: Ji sir main aapke account manager mujhe keh rahi hu.
Customer: Madam main aapko ha ji sir. Main aapko thodi der baad call karu thoda busy tha main abhi.
Executive: Okay sir aap isi number pe call kar lijiyega okay number. Okay main main kar lunga theek hai. Okay okay sir okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was busy and requested a call back later.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to have the customer call back.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to slightly hurried.





@@@Key Topics:

call, busy, callback
